CSGO is just a little mom and pop indie game, and it shows. The textures look like they were made a decade ago and the weapon selection is limited. However, i think the concept has some potential. The maps are very intuitively designed and play making is complex. Maybe we will see an esports scene sometime in the future, i think it would be fun to watch.
